`dcmodifydt` executes modification rules on a data.table.

## Installation


The development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("data-cleaning/dcmodifydt")
```
## Example

```{r}
library(dcmodifydt)
```
